item.title: Hello
item.description:

About Me

In progress…

About This Blog

This blog is built on the hugo framework and hugo-theme-stack theme. The default language is Korean, but English is also supported.

Deployment is done automatically through GitHub Actions. The deployment process is as follows:

  • Write posts in Korean
  • git push -> run workflow
  • Check for changed or newly added .md files
  • Translate these files into English (using OpenAI api; gpt3.5)
  • Build hugo
  • Deploy the built files as a submodule
  • Deploy from submodule to GitHub Pages

If you are curious about the details, check out the workflow!

Although the title is dev-log, I may also occasionally post about hobbies and random thoughts in diary format. ðŸ˜Š
